name: Azhdaha
desc:
Ancient Geovishap Ancestor: Azhdaha

The faint rattling of this dragon lord's shackles and his deep, angry growl echo through the bowels of the mountains like memories of a bygone era.

Ancient Geovishap Ancestor: Azhdaha

The faint rattling of this dragon lord's shackles and his deep, angry growl echo through the bowels of the mountains like memories of a bygone era.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text: Tavern Challenge: Friendly Fracas - Azhdaha's Wrath

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow!" "According to my stray friends who have been to Liyue, cats and other creatures living in the mountains are taught by their elders to pay attention to the tremblings of the earth, so that they might avoid impending calamity..."
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: "Azhdaha" is immune to Frozen, Stun, and Petrification. End Phase: Based on the Element that Azhdaha has currently absorbed, absorb the power of a different Element.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.desc:

The faint rattling of this dragon lord's shackles and his deep, angry growl echo through the bowels of the mountains like memories of a bygone era.

"Today is the day... We settle this now!"

customize.text: Tavern Challenge: Serious Showdown - Azhdaha's Fury

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow!" "Could it be that the earth itself is capable of anger? Such frightful scenes are hard for us city cats to even picture... Faced with rage of such magnitude, only the most powerful of individuals could hope to quell the earth's fury!"
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: "Azhdaha" is immune to Frozen, Stun, and Petrification. End Phase: Based on the Element that Azhdaha has currently absorbed, absorb the power of a different Element.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Azhdaha
customize.desc:
Ancient Geovishap Ancestor: Azhdaha

The faint rattling of this dragon lord's shackles and his deep, angry growl echo through the bowels of the mountains like memories of a bygone era.

customize.text:
*Has 40 HP
<color=#ffffffd9>Prerequisite</color>
Complete 3 challenge objective(s) in Azhdaha's Wrath

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
Deals 3 <color=#ffe699>Geo DMG</color> . If a Crystallize reaction occurs, then this character will perform <color=#ffffff>Elemental Absorption</color> .
If during the usage of this skill, the character hasn't absorbed an element's power yet, then <color=#ffffff>Stone Facets: Elemental Crystallization</color> will be attached.
<color=#ece5d8>Elemental Absorption</color>
Azhdaha can absorb the power of <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> / <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> / <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> / <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> . (Only 1 can be absorbed at any one time)
<color=#ffffff>When Azhdaha has absorbed any of the above Elements:</color> Based on the type of Element that was absorbed, gain the skills <color=#99ffff>Frostspike Wave</color> / <color=#80c0ff>Torrential Rebuke</color> / <color=#ff9999>Blazing Rebuke</color> / <color=#ffacff>Thunderstorm Wave</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Stone Facets: Elemental Crystallization</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>After this character takes</color> <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> / <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> / <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> / <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> <color=#ffffff>DMG:</color> If this character currently has not absorbed the power of this element, remove this effect, and then this character performs <color=#ffffff>Elemental Absorption</color> .

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
Deals 4 <color=#ffe699>Geo DMG</color> . DMG +1 for each element previously absorbed.

<color=#ffd780>Passive Skill</color>
(Passive) When the battle begins, this character gains <color=#ffffff>Stone Facets: Elemental Absorption</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Stone Facets: Elemental Absorption</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
The character can absorb the power of the Elements, including <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> / <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> / <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> / <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> , and then based on the element absorbed, gain the skills <color=#99ffff>Frostspike Wave</color> / <color=#80c0ff>Torrential Rebuke</color> / <color=#ff9999>Blazing Rebuke</color> / <color=#ffacff>Thunderstorm Wave</color> . (The character can only have one Elemental Type absorbed at once, and this status will record the Elemental Type previously absorbed)
<color=#ffffff>After this character absorbs an element of a different type than the currently absorbed element:</color> Generate 1 Elemental Die of the same type as the Element that was just absorbed.

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
Deals 3 <color=#99ffff>Cryo DMG</color> . This character gains <color=#ffffff>Stone Facets: Elemental Crystallization</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Stone Facets: Elemental Crystallization</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>After this character takes</color> <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> / <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> / <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> / <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> <color=#ffffff>DMG:</color> If this character currently has not absorbed the power of this element, remove this effect, and then this character performs <color=#ffffff>Elemental Absorption</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Elemental Absorption</color>
Azhdaha can absorb the power of <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> / <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> / <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> / <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> . (Only 1 can be absorbed at any one time)
<color=#ffffff>When Azhdaha has absorbed any of the above Elements:</color> Based on the type of Element that was absorbed, gain the skills <color=#99ffff>Frostspike Wave</color> / <color=#80c0ff>Torrential Rebuke</color> / <color=#ff9999>Blazing Rebuke</color> / <color=#ffacff>Thunderstorm Wave</color> .

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
Deals 3 <color=#80c0ff>Hydro DMG</color> . This character gains <color=#ffffff>Stone Facets: Elemental Crystallization</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Stone Facets: Elemental Crystallization</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>After this character takes</color> <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> / <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> / <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> / <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> <color=#ffffff>DMG:</color> If this character currently has not absorbed the power of this element, remove this effect, and then this character performs <color=#ffffff>Elemental Absorption</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Elemental Absorption</color>
Azhdaha can absorb the power of <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> / <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> / <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> / <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> . (Only 1 can be absorbed at any one time)
<color=#ffffff>When Azhdaha has absorbed any of the above Elements:</color> Based on the type of Element that was absorbed, gain the skills <color=#99ffff>Frostspike Wave</color> / <color=#80c0ff>Torrential Rebuke</color> / <color=#ff9999>Blazing Rebuke</color> / <color=#ffacff>Thunderstorm Wave</color> .

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
Deals 3 <color=#ff9999>Pyro DMG</color> . This character gains <color=#ffffff>Stone Facets: Elemental Crystallization</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Stone Facets: Elemental Crystallization</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>After this character takes</color> <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> / <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> / <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> / <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> <color=#ffffff>DMG:</color> If this character currently has not absorbed the power of this element, remove this effect, and then this character performs <color=#ffffff>Elemental Absorption</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Elemental Absorption</color>
Azhdaha can absorb the power of <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> / <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> / <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> / <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> . (Only 1 can be absorbed at any one time)
<color=#ffffff>When Azhdaha has absorbed any of the above Elements:</color> Based on the type of Element that was absorbed, gain the skills <color=#99ffff>Frostspike Wave</color> / <color=#80c0ff>Torrential Rebuke</color> / <color=#ff9999>Blazing Rebuke</color> / <color=#ffacff>Thunderstorm Wave</color> .

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
Deals 3 <color=#ffacff>Electro DMG</color> . This character gains <color=#ffffff>Stone Facets: Elemental Crystallization</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Stone Facets: Elemental Crystallization</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>After this character takes</color> <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> / <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> / <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> / <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> <color=#ffffff>DMG:</color> If this character currently has not absorbed the power of this element, remove this effect, and then this character performs <color=#ffffff>Elemental Absorption</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Elemental Absorption</color>
Azhdaha can absorb the power of <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> / <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> / <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> / <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> . (Only 1 can be absorbed at any one time)
<color=#ffffff>When Azhdaha has absorbed any of the above Elements:</color> Based on the type of Element that was absorbed, gain the skills <color=#99ffff>Frostspike Wave</color> / <color=#80c0ff>Torrential Rebuke</color> / <color=#ff9999>Blazing Rebuke</color> / <color=#ffacff>Thunderstorm Wave</color> .

Reacts with Elements if they are already applied:
[ <color=#ffe699>Geo</color> + <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Cryo Crystallize</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
[ <color=#ffe699>Geo</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Hydro Crystallize</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
[ <color=#ffe699>Geo</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Pyro Crystallize</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
[ <color=#ffe699>Geo</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Electro Crystallize</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)

Applies Cryo and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Melt</color> : DMG +2 for this instance
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Superconduct</color> : DMG+1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Frozen</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, the target is unable to perform any Actions this Round (Can be removed in advance after the target receives Physical or Pyro DMG, in which case they will take +2 DMG)

Applies Hydro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>+</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> <color=#ffffff>] Vaporize</color> : DMG +2 for this instance
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>+</color> <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> <color=#ffffff>] Electro-Charged</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>+</color> <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> <color=#ffffff>] Frozen</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, the target is unable to perform any Actions this Round (Can be removed in advance after the target receives +2 Physical or Pyro DMG)
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>+</color> <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> <color=#ffffff>] Bloom</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Dendro Core</color> ] that grants +2 DMG to the next instance of Pyro or Electro DMG

Applies Pyro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> + <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Melt</color> : DMG +2 for this instance
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Vaporize</color> : DMG +2 for this instance
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Overloaded</color> : DMG +2 for this instance, the target is forcibly switched to the next character
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> + <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Burning</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Burning Flame</color> ] that will deal 1 Pyro DMG at the end of the Round (Takes effect once, max 2 stacks)

Applies Electro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Overloaded</color> : DMG +2 for this instance, the target is forcibly switched to the next character
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Superconduct</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Electro-Charged</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Quicken</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Catalyzing Field</color> ] that grants +1 DMG to the next 2 instances of Dendro or Electro DMG

<color=#ece5d8>Physical DMG</color>
Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.

value.name: Lunar Cycles Unending
value.desc:
Azhdaha: Lunar Cycles Unending

"Today is the day... We settle this now!"

value.text: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with Azhdaha

value.name: Azhdaha
value.desc:
An enormous dragon as ancient as the mountains themselves.
In an age that has all but faded from memory, he stood shoulder to shoulder with one who ruled over a harbor of stone. But in the end, the two came into conflict, and the dragon was banished to a dark place deep underground. Over the long years of his imprisonment, his power has slowly dissipated. He has also become disfigured from the various kinds of erosion he has been subjected to.
The faint rattling of this dragon lord's shackles and his deep, angry growl echo through the bowels of the mountains like memories of a bygone era.
